++ Yocto Project Bitbake


TaskScheduler/BuildAutomationTool used by Yocto
  - Analogous to the Make/CMake type build automation tool(s)
  - executes tasks based on YoctoProjectMetadata
  - parses python and shell script mixed code
  - code parsed generates and runs tasks, a set of steps ordered according to code's dependencies.

reads YoctoProjectRecipe(s) and follows them by: 
  - fetching packages, 
  - building them 
  - incorporating the results into bootable images.
